name: Lost Cosmonaut
description:
Rejoice comrades! For you have survived the crash landing! Become lost on a randomly generated planet in Lost Cosmonaut, an action platformer with roguelike elements.

Features:
  • Fight for your survival against the aggressive alien inhabitants
  • Over 10 powerful bosses to face
  • Explore 10 massive randomly generated levels with different terrains and enemies
  • Unlock up to 8 special characters
  • Incredible original soundtrack
